name: Little Square Things
description: Forget the box. Think outside the entire warehouse!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Windows-based sound card Additional Notes: These minimum requirements are approximations. If you as an Early Access participant find that the game needs more, please leave a comment or contact directly. That sort of feedback is very valuable.
